//: Appears in the refugee center as shopkeeper with missions.  Faction critical.

dynamic_line.yes: Do you want anything from me? I'm a bit busy being at the moment.
dynamic_line.no: Do you want anything from me? I'm a bit busy being at the moment.

responses.text: What is it like being a doctor in this station?
Do you have any medical items for me?
Do you have a task for me?
Goodbye, thank you for your time.

dynamic_line.yes: It's actually pretty easy, all things considered. Most of the time people come back with little more than a few cave hopper scratches. Watch out for nighstalkers though, they can be pretty nasty.
dynamic_line.no: It's actually pretty easy, all things considered. Most of the time people come back with little more than a few cave hopper scratches. Watch out for nighstalkers though, they can be pretty nasty.

dialogue.describe: Look, I'm a bit busy here, but I think you could help me out here. I fear that more skirmishes with other stations are on the horizon, and its imperative that we prepare for any eventuality. Would you be willing to get me an adrenaline syringe?
dialogue.offer: Would you be willing to get me an adrenaline syringe? I think the troops out in the Underrail would greatly appreciate it.
dialogue.advice: Look for doctor's officers and hospitals on the surface, you'll probably find some there.
dialogue.inquire: Have you found what I requested yet?
dialogue.success: Great work, this adrenaline will be useful.
dialogue.success_lie: That's odd, I don't really know what to say.
dialogue.failure: Well, you did what you could. but it's unfortunate that we'll be lacking adrenaline.
